Make time for games: Prendi il tempo per i giochi
Generic login error message: [IT] An error occurred while trying to log in. If the problem persists, please contact the system administrator.
NoYourMove: [IT] No games waiting for your move.
NoOpponentMove: [IT] No games waiting on opponent's move.
ChallengeDescriptionNoVariants: [IT] You issued a challenge for a game of {{game}}.
ChallengeDescriptionVariants: [IT] You issued a challenge for a game of {{game}} with variants {{variants}}.
ChallengeDescriptionNoVariantsAccepter: [IT] You accepted a challenge from {{challenger}} for a game of {{game}}.
ChallengeDescriptionVariantsAccepter: [IT] You accepted a challenge from {{challenger}} for a game of {{game}} with variants {{variants}}.
OtherPlayers: [IT] So far the following other players are willing to participate in the game: {{others}}.
PlayersAccepted: [IT] So far the following players are willing to participate in the game: {{others}}.
TwoPlayersChallengeDescriptionVariants: [IT] You challenged {{other}} to a game of {{game}} with variants {{variants}}.
TwoPlayersChallengeDescriptionNoVariants: [IT] You challenged {{other}} to a game of {{game}}.
ChallengeClock: [IT] The clock start time will be {{start}} hours, incremented by {{inc}} hours after each move, with a maximum of {{max}} hours.
HardTime: [IT] Hard time: the system will enforce time limits.
SoftTime: [IT] No hard time: a loss on time need to be claimed by the opponent.
NumChallenge2: [IT] There will be 2 players in this game.
NumChallenge: [IT] There will be {{num}} players in this game. {{players}}. Seating will be random.
NoOtherPlayersAccepted: [IT] No other players have accepted yet.
OtherPlayersAccepted: [IT] The following other players have already accepted: {{others}}
ChallengeResponseDescVars: [IT] {{opp}} challenged you to a game of {{game}} with variants: {{variants}}
ChallengeResponseDescVars1: [IT] {{opp}} challenged you to a game of {{game}} with variant: {{variants}}
ChallengeResponseDescNoVars: [IT] {{opp}} challenged you to a game of {{game}} with no variants
HelpClockHard: [IT] A hard clock is enforced by the system.
HelpClockStart: [IT] Time on clock at the start of the game.
HelpClockMax: [IT] Remaining time won't become more than this.
ProfileName: [IT] Your desired display name. It must be unique across names currently in use and those recently used.
ProfileCountry: [IT] 2 Character Country code of where you want to tell people you're from
ProfileAnon: [IT] Would you like to be anonymous?
ProfileConsent: [IT] Do you consent to the Abstract Play's terms of service and the privacy policy?
Waiting: [IT] Waiting on other players to submit their moves
ConfirmResignDesc: [IT] Are you sure you want to resign?
ConfirmTimeoutDesc: [IT] Your opponent is out of time. Are you sure you want to claim the win?
GoBegin: [IT] Show beginning of game. Keys: Home or 'h'.
GoPrev: [IT] Show previous move. Keys: left arrow or 'j'.
GoNext: [IT] Show next move (and first variant if any). Keys: right arrow or 'k'.
GoNextVar: [IT] Show next move variant. Keys: down arrow or 'm'.
GoPrevVar: [IT] Show previous variant. Keys: up arrow or 'i'.
GoCurrent: [IT] Show current position. Keys: End or 'l'.
SelectSeating: [IT] Select seating, that is in what order players will start the game.
Level: [IT] Where would you like these colors applied?
AnnotationLevel: [IT] Where would you like this choice applied?
CommentTooLong: [IT] Comments can be at most 4K characters
CommentsTooLong: [IT] You are approaching that max total size of comments for a game. Soon new comments won't be accepted.
IncludeAcceptDrawOffer: [IT] a draw has been offered. Do you accept?
